dialog: How boring. Pass. Hold on! Ginseng tea! Now that sounds promising. What does it sing? I'm partial to something upbeat and jazzy.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: This is what you were hoping for? But this is the complete opposite of your tea parties.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Now, let's see. I have the perfect tea and the perfect tea service. What else do I need for the perfect tea party? Oh! Decorations, of course!
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: A teapot that just pours tea? How positively dreadful!
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Well, I can just pop us in some more.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Why, thank you for noticing. I also couldn't help but notice that you need a refill.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Maybe it's not as bad as I think. Maybe Fluttershy would be comfortable having a tea party here.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Oh! You remembered to cut off the crusts for me.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: I think you'll be quite pleased with the green tea I've selected for us today.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Excuse me. Is this where Fluttershy usually buys her tea?
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Uh, well, it tastes delicious.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Can I trouble you for another sugarcube?
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: Oops! Butterfingers! How embarrassing.
title: Discordant Harmony

dialog: [gasps] So what you're saying is no tea? Ugh. Well. [clears throat] That's fine. I wasn't thirsty anyway.
title: Dungeons & Discords

dialog: We like each other. That was the point! I'm actually pretty lukewarm about cake.
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: Actually, Pinkie Pie, who are you taking to... I mean, do you... eugh, oh, you know what? I am famished. I'll take all the cakes.
title: Make New Friends but Keep Discord

dialog: Oh, I doubt that. [munching] Hungry? Suit yourselves. Oh! What have you got there?
title: Princess Twilight Sparkle - Part 2

dialog: But I do like tea! Every tea! All the teas! Chamomile, Earl Grey, green, white, yellow, mate, lemon, ginger, chai, spearmint, peppermint, hibiscus... [inhale] ...cinnamon, pumpkin spice.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: [sniffing] This smells... uh... palatable.
title: The Break Up Break Down

dialog: What? I was simply going to ask for a teeny, tiny glass of water.
title: Three's A Crowd

dialog: Oopsie-doopsie, I almost left with the little journal you've all been keeping. What a fascinating read. Haven't you girls just learned so much? I've bookmarked a few of the more interesting passages. You really should take a look! [to Fluttershy, hushed] We're still on for tea later, aren't we, Fluttershy?
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

dialog: [singsong] Well, I'll bring the cucumber sandwiches...!
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1

dialog: I did. I imagine they'll be your last decent meal for quite some time.
title: Twilight's Kingdom - Part 2

dialog: Orange! Like the ones at the Applejack farm! I-I mean, from this weekend!
title: What About Discord?

dialog: Oh, what a brilliant idea! Shall we begin with the lunch date that kicked off the glorious weekend you missed out on?
title: What About Discord?

dialog: Everything is fine, Mr. and Mrs. Cake.
title: A Bird in the Hoof

dialog: As do I. As Princess, I care deeply about all creatures, great and small.
title: A Bird in the Hoof

dialog: Of course, Starlight! I really enjoy doing it. It's a small way to say I care.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: In that case, they are terrible!
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: Good morning, sister! Join us?
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: Like I said, I enjoy this part.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: Oh! Heh. H-How... eh, nice. Ahem. [chews, gags, gulps] They're... delicious. Heh. Thank you.
title: A Royal Problem

dialog: I told you that you needed to make some friends, nothing more. I saw the signs of Nightmare Moon's return, and I knew it was you who had the magic inside to defeat her, but you could not unleash it until you let true friendship into your heart. Now if only another will as well. Princess Luna!
title: Friendship is Magic, part 2

dialog: Hmm. The sewing machine cake is actually better than the cake cake.
title: 28 Pranks Later

dialog: Let's see if there are any cookies.
title: Call of the Cutie

dialog: [laughs nervously, sighs] That was, uh... one tasty bite. Still a little hungry, though.
title: Forever Filly

dialog: Oh, um... I guess another scoop would be fine!
title: Forever Filly

dialog: I think they're gonna drink it.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: Punch! We made punch. We were gonna set up a stand and try to sell it but, heh, we needed somepony to taste-test it first.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: Too strangely obsessed with tubs of jelly.
title: Hearts and Hooves Day

dialog: We thought we'd get every creature together for a picnic on the beach.
title: Surf and/or Turf

dialog: A treat from Sugarcube Corner will cheer you up.
title: The Cutie Pox
